front.title: Elliptic Curve Algorithms for Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) Encrypted Key Package Content Type

abstract.t: This document describes the conventions for using several Elliptic Curve cryptographic algorithms with the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) encrypted key package content type. Specifically, it includes conventions necessary to implement ECDH with EnvelopedData and ECDSA with SignedData.
